venue.name: The Function Hall (1st floor) of Imperial Towers

item.description:
The holiday season is here and Chanukah is just around the corner.  So, let's mark our calendars and plan to celebrate the Mosaic way!  The festive, fun-filled evening will include lots of activities and socializing, as well as an optional matone oysbayt (gift exchange) for humorous $10 gifts. We'll gamble with a dreidel and perhaps even sing a few traditional holiday songs.

Our menu will include latkes with all the fixings, vegetables and dip, and too many other treats to mention!

Please consider bringing a non-perishable food or toiletry contribution for Family Table, greater Boston’s Jewish food pantry.  (No meat or shellfish ingredients, please.)

RSVP: Mandatory by Tuesday December 4th. You can pay via paypal on the Mosaic website Mosaicofmass.org (look for the Chanukah party event listing there next week) or bring a payment with you to the party.

COST: $8 for Mosaic members, plus an extra $5 (total of $13) for Meetup participants and guests. The party and non-member fee will be waived for anyone from Meetup who joins Mosaic of MA ($25 for a year) at the party, we'll have membership forms available. 

Optional:  Donations above and beyond the ticket price will be graciously accepted to help defray the cost of renting the hall (a big "thank you" in advance!).
item.how_to_find_us: Just look for a band of people enjoying latkes

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Our Chanukah Party is right around the corner
